company_info.Company Description: Thank you for giving us an opportunity to present Integrated Recruitment Solutions from Shine.com – HT Media Ltd, India’s 2nd largest Job Board to your esteemed organization.We are confident that our solutions will reduce your turnaround time, enhance your productivity with easy to use interface, and maximize the return on investment.

api_data.job_title: Hiring for Telecaller in Tour & Travels
